verses.text: And \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hanani|strong="H2607"\w* the \w seer|strong="H2374"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w meet|strong="H6440"\w* him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, Shouldest thou \w help|strong="H5826"\w* the \w ungodly|strong="H7563"\w*, and \w love|strong="H0157"\w* them that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*? \w therefore|strong="H2063"\w* \add is\add* \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* upon thee from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

\w Nevertheless|strong="H0061"\w* there are \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in thee, in that thou hast taken \w away|strong="H1197"\w* the \w groves|strong="H0842"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and hast \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: and he went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* through the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* from \w Beer-sheba|strong="H0884"\w* to \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and brought them \w back|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 19.4 \ft he went…: Heb. he returned and went out\f*

¶ And he \w set|strong="H5975"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* throughout all the \w fenced|strong="H1219"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w city|strong="H5892"\w* by \w city|strong="H5892"\w*,

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w judges|strong="H8199"\w*, Take \w heed|strong="H7200"\w* what ye \w do|strong="H6213"\w*: for ye \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* not for \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, but for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, who \add is\add* with you in the \w judgment|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 19.6 \ft in…: Heb. in the matter of judgment\f*

Wherefore now let the \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* be upon you; take \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add it:\add* for \add there is\add* no \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* with the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, nor \w respect|strong="H4856"\w* of \w persons|strong="H6440"\w*, nor \w taking|strong="H4727"\w* of \w gifts|strong="H7810"\w*.

¶ Moreover in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* did \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w set|strong="H5975"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, and \add of\add* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and of the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, for the \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and for \w controversies|strong="H7379"\w*, when they \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And he \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* them, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus shall ye \w do|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w faithfully|strong="H0530"\w*, and with a \w perfect|strong="H8003"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

And what \w cause|strong="H7379"\w* soever shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to you of your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, between \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* and \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, between \w law|strong="H8451"\w* and \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w*, \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* and \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, ye shall even \w warn|strong="H2094"\w* them that they \w trespass|strong="H0816"\w* not against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \add so\add* \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* come upon you, and upon your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*: \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, and ye shall not \w trespass|strong="H0816"\w*.

And, behold, \w Amariah|strong="H0568"\w* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \add is\add* over you in all \w matters|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and \w Zebadiah|strong="H2069"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w*, the \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, for all the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w matters|strong="H1697"\w*: also the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \add shall be\add* \w officers|strong="H7860"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you. \w Deal|strong="H6213"\w* \w courageously|strong="H2388"\w*, and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall be with the \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.  +  r 19.11  t Deal…: Heb. Take courage and do *
